lead_paragraph: The president of Louisville announced a one-year postseason ban Friday for the Cardinals men's basketball team amid ongoing investigations into a sex scandal, a decision that stunned coach Rick Pitino.

headline.print_headline: Louisville Announces Postseason Ban for Men's Basketball
headline.main: Louisville Announces Postseason Ban for Men's Basketball
